mapper.select: select userinfo.id,userinfo.uid,userjjc.score,userprop.* from userinfo,userjjc,userprop where userinfo.uid =userjjc.uid and userinfo.utoken= #{utoken} and userinfo.uid =userprop.uid
update usergame,userjjc set usergame.ugold=usergame.ugold+#{ugold},userjjc.score=userjjc.score-#{score_consume} where usergame.uid=#{uid} and userjjc.uid=#{uid}
update usergame,userjjc set usergame.ucharge=usergame.ucharge+#{ucharge},userjjc.score=userjjc.score-#{score_consume} where usergame.uid=#{uid} and userjjc.uid=#{uid}
